Package main

Class CodonTranslate

java.lang.Object
main.CodonTranslate
public class CodonTranslate
extends java.lang.Object
A class to convert codons to amino acids. The class provides a static Map that links each codon with its corresponding amino acid, and methods to manipulate this map and provide a translation. This code is licensed under the Hippocratic License, for further details please consult the LICENSE.txt file in the project folder.

    • CodonTranslate

      public CodonTranslate​(java.lang.String dnaString, boolean rna)
      Constructor for objects of class CodonTranslate
      Parameters:
      dnaString - A full DNA string containing codons.
      rna - If the string is RNA, if it is not then it needs to be converted from DNA to RNA.

  • Method Details

    • createTranslator

      public void createTranslator​(java.lang.String dnaString, boolean rna) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Method to create a translator without using an overloaded constructor.
      Parameters:
      dnaString - RNA/DNA string containing codons.
      rna - Boolean to determine if the string is RNA
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If anything is thrown in initialiseCodonList()

    • convertToAminoAcid

      public java.util.List<java.lang.Character> convertToAminoAcid​(boolean printToConsole) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      A method to convert a list of codons into their respective amino acids. It does this by checking the static HashMap for matching codons, adding them into a LinkedList, and then returning the completed LinkedList.
      Parameters:
      printToConsole - If this boolean is set to true, then the method will also print the processed linked list to the console, before returning the list.
      Returns:
      List of type LinkedList containing a translated DNA string.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parsed list contains an invalid codon i.e. a codon that does match with any key in the HashMap.
